content: The Hyatt Centric South Beach Miami sounds like a great option. I'll definitely consider it. By the way, I'm really looking forward to my trip to Miami, it'll be a nice break from all the flight delays I've experienced recently. Speaking of which, I had a 1-hour delay on my United Airlines flight from Boston to Chicago last month due to air traffic control issues. But at least the pilot kept us well-informed throughout the delay.
